import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link,useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; const Navbar= (props) =>{ const navigator= useNavigate(); const auth = props.isAuth function logout(){ localStorage.removeItem("token") navigator("/") } return (
Recommend.Me
{ auth? <> Watchlist Get Movie :"" }
) } export default Navbar
